list_definition.definition: a polite form of address (spoken or written) to a man

list_definition.mean_english: tước hiệu dùng trước tên đầu của một hầu tước hoặc tòng nam tước
list_definition.definition: in the United Kingdom, the title of a knight or baronet

list_ex_of_english: Surely that is a point that you can address, sir.
How privileged we are, sir, to have you with us.
The best way send one to come and check this small thing quickly sir.
My dear sir, it would be an excellent substitute for a sleeping draught.
Yes sir; so far as the official information is concerned, it is correct.
Yes, sir; it has been thought that another method can be substituted for the portfolios: the men will have a book given them.
Why is it, sir, that the 10-minute rule comes into force only at 6 pm?
And that is a matter of figures, sir!
